title: CNN anchor explains how Trump's election lies will affect future elections
description: CNN's Pamela Brown takes a look at how former President Donald Trump's Big Lie about the 2020 election will affect the next presidential election.

title: A haunted house actor stabbed an 11-year-old boy's foot while trying to scare him
description: Things got a little spooky after a haunted house actor stabbed an 11-year-old boy in the foot at a fairground in Ohio in an incident the business says was an accident.

title: Oldest polar bear in human care in North America dies
description: The oldest polar bear in human care in North America died Friday, according to the Milwaukee County Zoo in Wisconsin.

title: Portland police chief says he got over 1,200 calls for help in one weekend
description: As the city of Portland's police force experiences a staffing shortage, organizations like Portland Opportunities Industrialization Center are stepping up to help stop the city's uptick in gun violence. CNN's Ryan Young reports.

title: Is Britney Spears a victim of 'tragic White girl syndrome'?
description: This week on "Pop Off," CNN reporter Lisa Respers France talks all things Britney Spears, from her "Star Search" years to the #FreeBritney movement and her conservatorship battle. Subscribe to Lisa's "Pop Life Chronicles" newsletter here.

title: More men are abandoning college. Professor explains why this is dangerous
description: NYU Professor Scott Galloway says the drop in men going to college is part of a growing mating crisis in the US and that the country runs the risk of producing "too many of the most dangerous cohort in the world" if the trend isn't reversed.

title: Taliban put alleged kidnappers' bodies on display
description: The Taliban in Afghanistan have put on public display the bodies of four men who were killed after they allegedly carried out a kidnapping in the western city of Herat.

title: He ran for Zambian president five times and lost. Now he's basking in glow of historic win
description: Zambian leader Hakainde Hichilema is basking in the glow of his historic win in last month's election during his first visit to the United States as president.

title: Heinz releases gadget to put the squeeze on ketchup packets
description: Kraft Heinz has just rolled out a new product that the condiment company says is the "biggest innovation in sauce since the packet itself."

title: The Nigerian separatist movement being powered from a suburban London home
description: Tucked away down a quiet, leafy street in Peckham, southeast London, is the registered address of a movement seeking to break Nigeria apart.

title: UK and France reheat one of the world's oldest rivalries at a risky time for both
The Caribbean island where you need to earn $70,000 to enter
description: Whether you're a vaccine queen, a PCR prince or a quarantine king, there sure are a lot of requirements when it comes to getting around these days. Luckily CNN Travel is here to keep you updated on the latest developments. Here's what we learned in pandemic travel this week.

title: What happens if Germany shifts left?
description: Angela Merkel is about to bow out as chancellor of Germany after 16 years, marking the start of a new era for Europe's largest economy.

title: Do something good for yourself — nothing
description: Among the many tragedies Covid-19 has wrought, some people have found unexpected gifts.
